TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Kapacitetsopbygning af den nye albanske transmissionssystemoperatør (AL-Tirana)

CONTENTS.P: This procurement process is cancelled with immediate effect. No submissions will be accepted. The procurement process will be relaunched by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development. A procurement notice will be published shortly.
